name: Grids World
description:
Arcade Action and Adventure in a world full of dangers. This is not an easy game. Few are the brave who dare to travel it. Many dangers will try to prevent you from reaching your destination. Run, jump, by car, helicopter or boat, dodging spikes, spiders, saws ... Go ahead and get through all the phases. Play free !!!

Thanks for all

Play with Arrow:

Left/Right to walk

Up/Down to see

Space to jump

LCtrl to fire

Enjoy!!

#arcade #fangame #action #platformer
